short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show video playback duration in bookmark description.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Youtube Playback Times is a Google Chrome extension that prepends the video's duration to
your Youtube bookmarks.

If you ever find yourself bookmarking lots of videos to watch later, this extension is for you!

You can manage your available time better by selecting videos from your bookmarks that correspond to the time you have available for viewing.
